reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, with a great fit that's not too tight around the neckline.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is such a great sweater!
items.body: Soft, warm, flattering, and great quality! The turtleneck is comfy (not tight), and the split hem makes it look polished with jeans. Feels more expensive than it is. Mine fit slightly roomy, but in a good way. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Becki

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and quality.
items.body: I love this turtle neck sweater. It is beautiful. I have lost weight so I decided to try an XL instead of XXL and I am glad I did. It glides over my body and is buttery smooth. It is very roomy and I might have done ok with a large but I am keeping this. I sometimes have problems with sleeves being too long but it fits very well. I plan on buying it in another color. I bought brown and it is very pretty and goes well with a jacket I already purchased. Read more
items.author: Diana Kennedy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: Fits perfectly med ..I am 5’4” about 145 -150. Not so long for my height. Really nice weight / soft fabric! Ran it through the rinse cycle since I bought the bright red/ wine color. Color is true to pic Did not fade at all. This is becoming one of my favorite brands on Amazon. Plan to purchase other color. Read more
items.author: PrissyKat

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater for the price
items.body: Its a nice and soft sweater. Not too thick and not too thin. Runs a little large. After washing and drying it doea come out a little wrinkled but I sure it will be fine after wearing. Read more
items.author: AJ from Ohio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Saeater!
items.body: Perfect sweater. Not to clinging, soft, warm and a perfect fit. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Carol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive sweater.
items.body: Great sweater for a good price. Comfortable, hangs nicely on the body, and love the blue color. Read more
items.author: RMK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great material and comfortable
items.body: Love this turtleneck sweater! Phenomenal material and very comfortable! Not too warm! Great for under a jacket. Not too tight around the neckline! I ordered L but would consider M if I order again! Read more
items.author: Nana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Good!
items.body: Soft, proper fitting, does not shrink, turtleneck sweater! Looks expensive, but, wallet friendly. I wear a 38c bra, and the large is a perfect fit. It is not tight or form fitting. It looks classy and a just right fit. I wish the turtleneck was more. “ foldable,” it is high. I might put a stitch on it to hold it down to the height I like. Overall, this is a very good sweater! Read more
items.author: M. Strolis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Xmas Red, Blue, Deep Red, Army Green, Hot Pink, Pat2, Black, Pat1, Navy Blue, Orange, Red, Bright Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
